did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Congregational Church of Parma and Greece records, 1819-1867.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: First Congregational Church of Parma and Greece (N.Y.)

did.physdesc: {**Comma Separated List Of Material Formats,End With Period**.}
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: The records consist of three items and one volume. The first item is "Minutes of Ch[urch] meeting for formation of the Church in Parma" (1819); the second item is a confession from a member (1830); the third item is a church membership list compiled in 1867, covering the years 1819-1867. The volume is titled "The Sunday School Receiving Book. Congregational S.S. West Greece." and is a student record (1846).

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The church was founded in 1819. Meetings and services were held at the school house at Parma Center until 1825 when the church was built at West Greece.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: The records consist of three items and one volume. The "Minutes of Ch[urch] meeting for formation of the Church in Parma"; a confession from a member; church membership list compiled in 1867; and a student record "The Sunday School Receiving Book. Congregational S.S. West Greece."
